conbody.p: This section contains reference information for reporting commands that use the Cloud Controller (CLC).
Normally, you will just use command. If you want to run reports against the data warehouse, you need to export data from the CLC using the command.
conbody.note: Be aware that if you use the eureport-delete-data command, you cannot use the CLC for reporting. Once you delete data from the CLC, you have to run reports using the data warehouse.
